dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Gah!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: Stop this Milo!  Stop it now before it’s too late!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Too late?! It’s already too late for Mr. Fluffy!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: What, you want me to walk home hand-in-hand with these jerks?!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: You murdered my friends! How did you think I’d react!?

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Have you forgotten what heroes do?

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Shut up! I’ll kill you all!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: No! I don’t want to hurt you, Milo!

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: I’m sorry, Milo. I was hoping things would work out, but the Superhero Police are on their way.

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: I wish it was. There’s nothing I can do for you now.
